PROJECTS_LIST.TITLE: Showroom
PROJECTS_LIST.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Manage inventory, clients, user accounts, and sales history — built with Angular & .NET.
PROJECTS_LIST.DESCRIPTION:
As part of my summer internship, I developed a Management Web Application designed to handle stock, client records, user administration, and sales history in a centralized system.

The platform ensures accurate inventory tracking, reliable client management, and role-based access for different types of web users.

Built with Angular on the frontend for an interactive and user-friendly experience and .NET on the backend for secure APIs and solid business logic, the application streamlines daily operations, improves data consistency, and provides clear insights through historical sales tracking and reporting.

PROJECTS_LIST.TITLE: Book Social Network
PROJECTS_LIST.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: A social platform for book lovers to share their books, built with Angular & Spring Boot.
PROJECTS_LIST.DESCRIPTION:
Book Social Network is a full-stack application that enables users to manage their book collections and engage with a community of book enthusiasts.

It offers features such as user registration, secure email validation, book management (including creation, updating, sharing, and archiving), book borrowing with checks for availability, book return functionality, and approval of book returns.

The application ensures security using JWT tokens and adheres to best practices in REST API design. The backend is built with Spring Boot 3 and Spring Security 6, while the frontend is developed using Angular with Bootstrap for styling.

PROJECTS_LIST.TITLE: Investment Calculator
PROJECTS_LIST.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: A web app to calculate investment growth over time, built with Angular.
PROJECTS_LIST.DESCRIPTION:
The Investment Calculator is a web application designed to help users estimate the future value of their investments based on various parameters.

Users can input details such as the initial investment amount, monthly contributions, expected annual return rate, and investment duration.

The application then calculates and displays the projected growth of the investment over time, providing insights into how different factors can impact the final amount.

This tool is particularly useful for individuals planning their financial future and seeking to understand the potential outcomes of their investment strategies.

Built with Angular, the application features a user-friendly interface that allows for easy data entry and visualization of results.

PROJECTS_LIST.TITLE: Get Fit

PROJECTS_LIST.DESCRIPTION:
Get Fit is a web application designed to help users track and manage their fitness routines effectively.

With an intuitive interface built using Angular, Get Fit provides a seamless experience for users to stay motivated and committed to their fitness journey.

PROJECTS_LIST.TITLE: TO-DO

TO-DO is a straightforward web application designed to help users manage their daily tasks efficiently.

PROJECTS_LIST.TITLE: FitGear
PROJECTS_LIST.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: An interactive platform where coaches can use the powers of online-coaching to tutor their clients, built with Angular & Spring Boot.
PROJECTS_LIST.DESCRIPTION:
FitGear is a comprehensive web application designed to facilitate online coaching and fitness management.

The platform allows coaches to create and manage workout programs and diet plans, track client progress, and communicate effectively with their clients.

Clients can log their workouts, monitor their progress, and receive personalized coaching from their trainers.

Built with Angular for the frontend and Spring Boot for the backend, FitGear offers a seamless and interactive experience for both coaches and clients, making it easier to achieve fitness goals through structured guidance and support.
